title: Pico: My Little Summer Story
synopsis: An edited version of the first OVA titled pico~ Boku no Chiisana Natsu Monogatari (pico: My Little Summer Story) was released on November 11, 2007. It is a re-edited version of the animation seen in the Boku no Pico OVA set to a new script, featuring content that is more appropriate for viewers under the age of 18.
staff: [['Yatabe, Katsuyoshi', ['Director']], ['Takayama, Katsuhiko', ['Script']], ['Pico', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Yoshiten', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
